data.description: widgets/scripts for running a go tournament
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Games::Go::GoPair provides a few Tk widgets and a number of scripts
    for running an American Go Association (AGA) go tournament. It
    'use's Algorithm::Pair::Best for pairing and Games::Go::AGATourn for
    handling the AGA files.
